      • createRandomDoubleList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> createRandomDoubleList​(int size,
                                                                           int range)
        Creates and returns a reference to an ArrayList of the specified number of Double elements where each element is assigned a random value between 1 and range.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of Double elements to add to the list
        range - the range of random values to assign to each element [0, range)
        Returns:
        a reference to the newly created and initialized list

        Parameters:
        list - the list of number of potentially remove
